data.text:
Air Groove! Come and dance with me! 
Hold! Aaand lift!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text:
Yes! And I'll be there with the silver and gold confetti! It's 
going to be a stage you can be proud of!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru

data.text:
Oi, calm down! I think you two are getting a little bit carried 
away thanks to the excitement of the live performance!
data.name: Air Groove

data.text:
Hehe, excitement, huh? If it can still be felt once one steps 
off of the stage… the anniversary live performance carried a 
great amount of meaning in it, wouldn't you say?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
I agree. I heard that despite the distance, people from my 
hometown also watched it. They seemed grateful for it and I 
received a lot of messages about it afterwards.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
The performance was so amazing, 
it made so many people happy. Therefore, let's eat and celebrate 
to our hearts content, Rudolf.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Hmm… Haha, of course! Ah… However, I'd like to ask that you 
at least put the food onto a plate, Oguri Cap.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: …Oi.
data.name: Narita Brian

data.text:
Ah! It's Brian-san♪ What is it? Impressed with 
my performance? Which of my songs was it?
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
"ENDLESS DREAM!!" maybe? 
Brian-san's, "BLAZE" was also…
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Wrong… You need to eat more meat. If all you eat is sweets and 
snacks, you won't build up any muscle.
data.name: Narita Brian

data.text:
Ueee! You're acting like this during the afterparty!? 
Brian-san, you're acting too much like your usual self!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
…What lies at the end of our races, what lies at the end of our 
matches is live performances. Therefore, I see no issue with 
continuing to train whenever a chance presents itself.
data.name: Narita Brian

data.text:
Okay everyone, I would like to congratulate 
you all for the amazing anniversary live performances 
and the excellent afterparty.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
I appreciate your words of encouragement, President, however… 
the manager of the track notified me that "one of the students 
that was meant to be at the party was instead training".
data.name: Air Groove

data.text:
More importantly… Brian. 
Why was it your name that came up?
data.name: Air Groove

data.text: …Hmph.
data.name: Narita Brian

data.text:
Haha! It's fine, don't worry about it. I was going 
to tell her that she was free to do whatever she 
wanted after the performance anyways.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
After all, the autumn GI season is about to start… She was 
likely just preparing for the future.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
The curtain has finally closed on a spectacular 
stage, filled to the brim with glitter and cheers. 
What comes next is more exciting races!
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

title: After ④ -And The Gates Open Again-
